title: Talks on Russia-Ukraine War Enter 2nd Day in Geneva
summary_full: The discussions in Geneva, Switzerland, were expected to focus on Ukrainian-held territory in the east that Russia wants to control as the price of peace. Kyiv has said that demand is a nonstarter.
summary_public: The discussions in Geneva, Switzerland, were expected to focus on Ukrainian-held territory in the east that Russia wants to control as the price of peace. Kyiv has said that demand is a nonstarter.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia wants to control as the price of peace
